title: Weird lag with good FPS/ping

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds to me like some major packet loss.

Could you please do the following for me;

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

https://pastebin.com/ZeGJdMsk - That's my WinMTR results

http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=369839a0-14274-11967bfd-0378-4677-bf4b - And that is my Netalyzr results

Hey there,

Are you currently on a wired or a wireless connection?
Wireless connection. I probably won't be able to get wired connection for a long time.
How far are you from your router? Try moving closer to your router or switching your router to broadcast on a less used radio channel to help prevent interference.
I'm not too far away from the router, there's no room in the house for me to move an closer sadly, I've also played LoL on this PC before without these packet loss issues.
lol i have the same problem is well
